input.sentences: [female] posing in front of one of the pyramids .
some huge pyramids off in the distance .
our camel train that took us to the pyramids .
this was dinky | our personal camel .
the face on this one was worn away over time .
output.sentences: My dream of going to Egypt was finally realized.
There in front of me stood the great pyramids, looming large on the landscape.
We traveled there on camel back in sort of a train.
As we stopped along the way, I realized what friendly animals camels can be.
The triumph of the day was finding myself right in front of the Great Sphinx--glorious.
